name: Clumsy Wizard
description:
You are late to the winter solstice! On your way to the ritual, in your haste you have slammed all the runes off a wall! Can you cast enough spells to guide the rituals magic through to power the world?

Use the mouse to click squares and drag in the direction you want to cast.

~*~*~

http://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/clumsy-wizard-0

~*~*~
